Lines.Description: Print 'Runtime Error: no loaded talkpad' on quit
If forcefadeout == false AND level is not zero AND brightness < fadetime ELSE GOTO 00000328
If actor_type is not zero ELSE GOTO 00000522
If actor_spawnerid == newvalue AND actor_uniqueid != newvalue ELSE GOTO 00000792
Print 'Runtime Error: Bad teleporter' on quit
If teleport is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001218
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001330
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00001418
If camera_x < Player_X / XRes * XRes ELSE GOTO 00001588
If camera_x > Player_X / XRes * XRes ELSE GOTO 00001660
If camera_y < Player_y / yres * yres ELSE GOTO 00001730
If camera_y > Player_y / yres * yres ELSE GOTO 00001800
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_left
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_right ELSE GOTO 00001922
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_left
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_right ELSE GOTO 00002064
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_up
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_down ELSE GOTO 00002200
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_up
If Test bit actor_lookdir on lookmask_down ELSE GOTO 00002362
Print 'Error: Level needs to be at least as tall as the current Y Resolution value {yres}' on quit
If Camera_XMin > MapWidth - XRes ELSE GOTO 00002870
If Camera_XMax > MapWidth - XRes ELSE GOTO 00002932
If Camera_YMin > MapHeight - YRes ELSE GOTO 00002986
If Camera_YMax > MapHeight - YRes ELSE GOTO 00003048
If teleport is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003232
If music is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003384
If audiodriver == audiodriver_ptplayer OR audiodriver == audiodriver_mdsdrv ELSE GOTO 00003496
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003600
If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003656
If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003752
If newvalue is not zero ELSE GOTO 00003914
If Test bit cd32_play on control1_buttons ELSE GOTO 00003992
If true is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004090
If Test bit cd32_play on control1_buttons ELSE GOTO 00004084
If music is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004450
If displaydirty & displaydirty_regenerate is not zero ELSE GOTO 00004816
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005088
Print 'Cannot change yres while level loaded' on quit
If ismegadrive is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005388
If IsNTSC is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005252
Print 'Y Resolution of 240 is not supported on NTSC Mega Drive' on quit
Print 'Y Resolution of {yres} is not supported on Mega Drive, only 224 (any) and 240 (pal)' on quit
If actor_x >= camera_x + XRes ELSE GOTO 00005492
If actor_y >= camera_y + yres ELSE GOTO 00005558
If panel is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005846
If level is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005846
If panel_bottom is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005888
If panel_top is not zero ELSE GOTO 00005950
If control1_buttons|control2_buttons|control3fire|control4fire is not zero ELSE GOTO 00006410
If control1_buttons is not zero ELSE GOTO 00006556
If actor_y >= camera_y + yres + 16 ELSE GOTO 00006680
If actor_x >= camera_x + xres + 16 ELSE GOTO 00006828
Print 'Thank you for playing' on quit
Say 'Don't go anywhere without your shield'

Say 'You found a sword!!!

You can now fight monsters.'

Say 'You found a shield!!!

Your defence rises by one point.'

Say 'N: Link's Home
W: Hyrule Field
E: Forest Temple'
Say 'The Kingdom of Hyrule has been in peace since Link, the last knight of Hyrule, had defeated the malicious Ganon and reclaimed the precious triforce from him.'
Say 'Nobody knows what Link's wish to the triforce was, but it had the effect of reunifying the Light and Dark world, and awakening the 7 wise men's descendants.'

Say 'Next, Link handed the Triforce and Master Sword over to Princess Zelda, and people started to believe that peace would last.<5>
But the people were wrong<3>.<3>.<3>.'
Say 'Unfortunately, Link's wish also had negative effects. Ganon and his henchmen were resurrected and got ready to attack.'

Say 'Somewhere in Hyrule Forest, Link is sleeping without suspecting that Ganon has already moved into attack.
<5>Until<3>.<3>.<3>.'
Yield on  timer to  next line

Say 'Help me!<5>
Help me!<5>
It's me,<2> Zelda!<3>
I'm talking to you by telepathy.'
Say 'I am a prisoner in the dungeon of the castle!'
Say 'Ganon is back, and he surely has already found the Triforce<3>.<3>.<3>.'
Say 'Come quickly to the castle Link, you are my only hope<3>.<3>.<3>.'
